name: Plünge
description:
Plünge is a player vs player party game originally designed to be played with toilet plunger controllers. Control two plumbers as they battle through epic minigames including but not limited to: wizard battles, pipe tennis and dating a sexy plumber.

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? Take the Plünge!

While Plünge is best with the custom controller, it can be played on a keyboard.

Tools
  • Unity
    • iTween
    • Fungus
    • Cinemachine
  • FMOD
  • Photoshop
  • Maya
